properties.value: The Tzhaar-ket-om (t) is a Tzhaar-ket-om with a Tzhaar-ket-om ornament kit attached to it. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the maul. It costs 231,092 for both the parts to make the Tzhaar-ket-om (t).

The Tzhaar-ket-om (t) is a Tzhaar-ket-om with a Tzhaar-ket-om ornament kit attached to it. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the maul. It costs 231,092 for both the parts to make the Tzhaar-ket-om (t).

While the maul is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable Tzhaar-ket-om and ornament kit.

[[File:Tzhaar-ket-om (t) detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''Tzhaar-ket-om (t)''' is a [[Tzhaar-ket-om]] with a [[Tzhaar-ket-om ornament kit]] attached to it. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the maul. It costs {{Coins|{{GEP|Tzhaar-ket-om}}+{{GEP|Tzhaar-ket-om ornament kit}}}} for both the parts to make the Tzhaar-ket-om (t).

While the maul is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable Tzhaar-ket-om and ornament kit.
